plot: Loneliness drives a man tot he desert. There, he looks for something he has forgotten long ago. Illusion guides his way.
title: Mopok
plot_es: Loneliness drives a man tot he desert. There, he looks for something he has forgotten long ago. Illusion guides his way.
plot_en: Loneliness drives a man tot he desert. There, he looks for something he has forgotten long ago. Illusion guides his way.
